name: Screenhead Arena
description:
I made a game!

Throw fireballs! Deploy shields! Win?

Put in a name and click "Host", share your game code with a friend have have them join in.

New in version 1.0.1: Training mode! Don't have anyone to play with? Just click the training mode button and shoot fireballs all by yourself.

Controls

WForwardSBackwards
AStrafe Left
DStrafe Right
SpaceJumpMouse Left
Shoot Fireball!
Mouse Right
Deploy Shield
